MetaInfo.title: Edit playlist - YouClip
MetaInfo.description: Playlist edit page of YouClip - YouTube online clipping app. You can modify the start/end time and the thumbnail of a clip, add another scene ot the clip, etc.

PlaylistDeleteModal.title: Delete playlist
PlaylistDeleteModal.message:
Permanently delete [{playlistName}]?
(You can't undo after deleting)

MetaInfo.title: Clip - YouClip
MetaInfo.description: Create clip page of YouClip - YouTube online clipping app. You can highlight and share your favorite moments of YouTube videos (e.g. Gaming, VTuber, etc) with no video editing experience needed.

MetaInfo.title: YouClip - YouTube動画の見所切り抜きサイト
MetaInfo.description: YouClip is YouTube online clipping app. You can highlight and share your favorite moments of YouTube videos (e.g. Gaming, VTuber, etc) with no video editing experience needed. Also you can enjoy popular clips other fans created.

Login.socialLogin: Login with your social media account
Login.emailLogin: Login with your email and password

MetaInfo.title: Login - YouClip
MetaInfo.description: Login page of YouClip - YouTube online clipping app.

MyPage.ableToAccessYourClips: You can access to your created/liked clips after login.

MetaInfo.title: My page - YouClip
MetaInfo.description: My page of YouClip - YouTube online clipping app. You can access to your created/liked clips after login.

Register.socialLogin: Login with your social media account
Register.textFieldHind: Password must be at least 6 characters.

MetaInfo.title: Sign up - YouClip
MetaInfo.description: Sign up of YouClip - YouTube online clipping app. You can access to your created/liked clips after login.

data.passwordRule: Password must be at least 6 characters.
